alert.note: Alert for Dickey; Emmons; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 04 at 12:37AM CDT until July 04 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CDT/5 AM MDT/ EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast North Dakota, including the following counties, in south central North Dakota, Emmons and Sioux. In southeast North Dakota, Dickey, La Moure, Logan and McIntosh. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CDT/5 AM MDT/ early this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall are possible across far south central North Dakota and the southern James River valley tonight. This could lead to flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Dickey; Emmons; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Sioux
